title: 3dNotes
description: A program to add, delete and show notes for AFNI datasets.

add_note.title: Add Note
add_note.description: Add the string 'str' to the list of notes.

append_history.title: Append History
append_history.description: Append the string 'str' to the dataset's history. This can only appear once on the command line.

replace_history.title: Replace History
replace_history.description: Replace any existing history note with 'str'. This option cannot be used with '-h'.

print_notes.title: Print Notes
print_notes.description: Print to stdout the expanded notes.
